description:
Lightweight down shorts for ski touring and day-to-day use during winter. Perfect as an extra layer
over shell trousers when taking a break, or as an insulating mid-layer on cold days. Full-length side
zippers make putting on/taking off easy, even with skis or boots on. The waistband has elastic at the
back and Velcro at the sides so can be easily adjusted depending on how many layers are worn underneath. Made from recycled polyamide and padded with ethically produced down.
name: Fjallraven Expedition Down Knickers - Mens
